column1: Smoque BBQ////a word on the service: it was really busy and since you order
column2: get a number and wait for it to get called to go up to the counter to get your food
column3: it had the potential to get really crazy and disorganized. But the few fellas that were helping guide traffic not only did a good job
column4: but they were really friendly and genuinely wanted to make ur dining experience better. one of the guys got a bottle opener for our beers and opened the bottles himself... even though we would have done it ourselves.
